author: David Choi
title: 'The President eats his own': Military veterans in Congress unload on Trump for abandoning a US ally in the ISIS fight
description: US veterans in Congress sounded off in protest to President Donald Trump's decision to condone an anticipated Turkish assault against the US-supported Kurdish militia in northeastern Syria. The decision was made public late Sunday and forces roughly 1,000 US …
content:
US military veterans in Congress sounded off in protest to President Donald Trump's decision to condone an anticipated Turkish assault against the US-supported Kurdish militia in northeastern Syria.
